import sys

from todo_app.services.todo_manager import TodoManager
from todo_app.cli.cli_interface import CLIInterface

# Test the core functionality
todo_manager = TodoManager\(\)
cli_interface = CLIInterface\(todo_manager\)

# Test add
cli_interface.parse_command\(""add ''Test task''""\)
assert len\(todo_manager.get_all_tasks\(\)\) == 1
print\(''âœ“ Add functionality works''\)

# Test view
cli_interface.display_tasks\(\)
print\(''âœ“ View functionality works''\)

# Test update
cli_interface.parse_command\(""update 1 ''Updated test task''""\)
task = todo_manager.get_task_by_id\(1\)
assert task.title == ''Updated test task''
print\(''âœ“ Update functionality works''\)

# Test complete
cli_interface.parse_command\(""complete 1""\)
task = todo_manager.get_task_by_id\(1\)
assert task.completed == True
print\(''âœ“ Complete functionality works''\)

# Test delete
cli_interface.parse_command\(""delete 1""\)
assert len\(todo_manager.get_all_tasks\(\)\) == 0
print\(''âœ“ Delete functionality works''\)

print\(''\\nðŸŽ‰ All functionality verified!''\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''src''\)
from todo_app.services.todo_manager import TodoManager
from todo_app.cli.cli_interface import CLIInterface

# Test the core functionality
todo_manager = TodoManager\(\)
cli_interface = CLIInterface\(todo_manager\)

# Test add
cli_interface.parse_command\(""add ''Test task''""\)
print\(''Add functionality works''\)

# Test view
cli_interface.display_tasks\(\)

# Test update
cli_interface.parse_command\(""update 1 ''Updated test task''""\)
task = todo_manager.get_task_by_id\(1\)
print\(''Update functionality works - Title:'', task.title\)

# Test complete
cli_interface.parse_command\(""complete 1""\)
task = todo_manager.get_task_by_id\(1\)
print\(''Complete functionality works - Completed:'', task.completed\)

# Test delete
cli_interface.parse_command\(""delete 1""\)
print\(''Delete functionality works - Total tasks:'', len\(todo_manager.get_all_tasks\(\)\)\)

print\(''All functionality verified!''\)
")

Bash(python -c "
import sys
import os
sys.path.insert\(0, os.path.join\(os.getcwd\(\), ''src''\)\)
from todo_app.services.todo_manager import TodoManager
from todo_app.cli.cli_interface import CLIInterface

# Create an instance and demonstrate functionality
todo_manager = TodoManager\(\)
cli_interface = CLIInterface\(todo_manager\)

print\(''=== Todo App Demo ===''\)
print\(\)
print\(''Adding tasks...''\)
cli_interface.parse_command\(""add ''Buy groceries''""\)
cli_interface.parse_command\(""add ''Walk the dog''""\)
cli_interface.parse_command\(""add ''Finish report''""\)
print\(\)

print\(''Viewing tasks...''\)
cli_interface.parse_command\(""view""\)
print\(\)

print\(''Updating a task...''\)
cli_interface.parse_command\(""update 1 ''Buy groceries - milk and bread''""\)
print\(\)

print\(''Marking a task as complete...''\)
cli_interface.parse_command\(""complete 2""\)
print\(\)

print\(''Viewing updated list...''\)
cli_interface.parse_command\(""view""\)
print\(\)

print\(''Deleting a task...''\)
cli_interface.parse_command\(""delete 3""\)
print\(\)

print\(''Final list:''\)
cli_interface.parse_command\(""view""\)
print\(\)
print\(''Demo completed successfully!''\)
")
